context: Motor vehicle operations on an expressway, governing speed and following distance.

MTL_expressions.description: When the vehicle is running faster than 100 km/h, the following distance is 100m or more

propositions.description: The vehicle is running faster than 100 km/h
assumptions: The vehicle speed is being monitored.
ambiguities: The exact speed of the vehicle is not specified beyond being higher than 100 km/h.

propositions.description: The following distance is maintained at 100m or more.
assumptions: The following vehicle maintains the distance from the vehicle in front.
ambiguities: The exact distance is not specified beyond being greater than 100 meters.

MTL_expressions.description: When the vehicle speed is lower than 100 km/h, the distance from the vehicle in front may be narrowed appropriately, but it should not be less than 50 meters.

propositions.description: The vehicle is running slower than 100 km/h
assumptions: The vehicle speed is being monitored.
ambiguities: The exact speed of the vehicle is not specified beyond being lower than 100 km/h.

propositions.description: The following distance is maintained at less than 100m but not less than 50m.
assumptions: The following vehicle maintains the distance from the vehicle in front.
ambiguities: The exact distance is not specified, other than it's less than 100m but not less than 50m.

dependency_sequence.dependency_description: The second expression follows the first, as the vehicle's speed decreases from over 100 km/h to less than 100 km/h
